name: Spaghetti Pie
author: Tina Schlosser
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package directions. Drain. You should have about 3 cups. Stir butter, cheese, and beaten eggs into spaghetti. Mix well. Form a crust with this mixture. Spread cottage cheese over spaghetti. Cook ground beef, onions, and green peppers until vegetables are tender and meat is brown. Drain off excess fat. Stir in undrained tomatoes, tomato paste, sugar, oregano, and garlic salt. Heat through. Pour on top of cottage cheese. Bake uncovered at 350Â° for about 20 minutes. Sprinkle the Mozzarella cheese on top and bake for five more minutes.
